Class Ledger.Failure

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable

        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • com.icodici.universa.node.Ledger.Failure
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Enclosing interface:
    Ledger

    public static class Ledger.Failure
extends java.lang.RuntimeException
    Exception (non-checked) class that should be thrown by implementation when inrecoverable errors happen like failre to save value.
